Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in variants that eventually lead to a successful Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION is immediately followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION relative to the total number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in variants involving more than one rejection cycle before final approval

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION appears in the same case more than once
